Articles.Content:
Hi,

It\'s a new year, and a new phase in Kerbal Space Program Development is upon us. That means our special Discouted Pre-Order offer is also drawing to a close.

As of January 16, The KSP Pre-Order price will go up to US$ 10.00. So, if you haven\'t pre-ordered already, you\'ll still be able to get it for US$ 7.00 during this week.

You can pre-order KSP at out Store.

We are sending this announcement out to everyone. If you\'ve already ordered KSP, you don\'t need to pay for anything else. It\'s yours already.

Once more, many thanks to all who pre-ordered KSP! Your support is what keeps us going!

Happy Launchings!

Cheers
A week from today, right?

A week from today, right?

Right

What forum should this go in then? General discussion?

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Skunky is right, this isn\'t the thread for such discussions.

That said, we ARE looking for alternatives to Paypal. The big problem is that there are very few options if you don\'t live in the US or Europe. Please bear with us on this one. We will add alternate payment methods as soon as we can find one.

Cheers
What about a postal address for sending a cheque?
Didn\'t someone say that it was possible to pay through Paypal, but with a credit card? Could someone tell me how that works?
When you go to pay, if you don\'t have an account, it will let you put in credentials without creating a paypal account.
So, I don\'t have to make an account, just put in the card information?

So, I don\'t have to make an account, just put in the card information?

That\'s right. PayPal still earn a fee for taking the money out of your credit card account and putting it into Squad\'s account, but you don\'t need to have a PayPal account.
Ok then, thanks.

What about a postal address for sending a cheque?

+1. I\'d be happy to pay by check rather than paypal.
[gmod]Like Skunky and HarvesteR just stated; this isn't the discussion thread for paypal, or alternative payment methods. We have a whole thread for it in the General Discussion.[/gmod]
Thanks for the discount! Just purchased!
